name: R5-condition-clinical-for-R4
title: Cross-version VS for R5.ConditionClinicalStatusCodes for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version ValueSet represents concepts from http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/condition-clinical|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4. Concepts not present here have direct `equivalent` mappings crossing all versions from R5 to R4.
